alert.note: Alert for Tuscaloosa (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 17 at 4:56PM CDT until June 17 at 5:45PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 PM CDT FOR EAST CENTRAL TUSCALOOSA AND SOUTHERN JEFFERSON COUNTIES... At 456 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Helena, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Southwestern Birmingham, Hoover, Vestavia Hills, Bessemer, Homewood, Mountain Brook, Hueytown, Fairfield, Pleasant Grove, Midfield, Adamsville, Brighton, Lipscomb, Lake View, Sylvan Springs, Mulga, Maytown, North Johns, Birmingham Fairgounds and Five Points South. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
